comment:
* A class that implements this interface can tell if a given element should 
 * strip whitespace nodes from it's children.

methods.name: public boolean shouldStripWhiteSpace(XPathContext support, Element targetElement) throws TransformerException
methods.comment: * Get information about whether or not an element should strip whitespace. * @see strip in XSLT Specification * * @param support The XPath runtime state. * @param targetElement Element to check * * @return true if the whitespace should be stripped. * * @throws TransformerException

methods.name: public boolean canStripWhiteSpace()
methods.comment: * Get information about whether or not whitespace can be stripped. * @see strip in XSLT Specification * * @return true if the whitespace can be stripped.

methodNames: public boolean shouldStripWhiteSpace(XPathContext support, Element targetElement) throws TransformerException
